post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hi everyone,



This month’s monthly meeting has been rescheduled to NEXT Wednesday, April  22, 2009.  The topic for next week’s session is  Taxonomy Management using MOSS 2007" exploring the various taxonomy types (hierarchical, web 2.0 style).  Shai Petel, a Microsoft Certified Trainer and Technology Specialist, will  review implementation scenarios and add-ons.  Shai Petel is also the Vice President of Research and Development for KWizCom, a leading developer of software components for Microsoft SharePoint.



PLEASE NOTE – The TSPUG website is down for the moment, as we make updates to it.

As a result, I am posting TSPUG meeting updates on the NLC blog at http://www.nonlinearcreations.com/blog/

If you can make it to next week’s session, please RSVP asap, so that I can determine how much pizza to order.

Please meet at Nexient Learning @ 2 Bloor Street West on the 12th Floor.

6:00pm – Pizza

6:15pm – Welcome & Introductions

6:30pm – Presentation

8:30pm – DONE

To RSVP, please email sibbotson@nonlinear.ca



*Pizza will be provided by our very generous sponsor, Non Linear Creations - non-linear creations (NLC) is a leading web development and IT integrator, helping clients leverage the business benefits of Internet technology to drive traffic, support sales, and achieve a strong return on online investments





Susie Ibbotson

Director, Marketing


non-linear creations inc.
524 Front St. West, Suite 200, Toronto, Ontario, Canada, M5V 1B8
cel: 416.553.0306  tel: 416.203.2997 ext: 247  fax: 416.203.3013  toll free: 1.866.915.2997

http://www.nonlinear.ca  |  sibbotson@nonlinear.ca

post.title: TSPUG Meeting - RESCHEDULED to Next Wednesday, April 22, 2009
